text: Petro Kostiantynovych Kravchuk (; 11 July 1962 – 3 August 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of Ukraine – Forward!. He was a People's Deputy of Ukraine from 2006 to 2008. Kravchuk was born in Volyn Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Kravchuk died on 3 August 2022, at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Volyn Oblast
title: Petro Kravchuk
